text: Bounce Patrol
Dance (dance!) Dance (dance!) Let’s d-d-d-dance!
It’s a dance party, everybody make your body dance
It’s a dance party (dance party!) Let’s d-d-d-dance!
It’s a dance party, everybody make your body dance
It’s a dance party (dance party!) Let’s d-d-d-dance!
Everybody’s jumping, music is pumping
Everybody’s jumping (jump, jump, jump, jump)
Step to the left, step to the right
Here we go, here we go, let the rhythm flow
It’s a dance party, everybody make your body dance
It’s a dance party (dance party!) Let’s d-d-d-dance!
Put your dance shoes on, wear your dance party pants
It’s a dance party (dance party!) Let’s d-d-d-dance!

Wave your hands in the air (wave, wave, wave)
Let’s dance, dance!

March like a marching band (march, march, march)
Let’s dance, dance!

Spin round and round (spin, spin, spin)
Let’s dance, dance!

Step to the front, step to the back
Here we go, here we go, let the rhythm flow
It’s a dance party, everybody make your body dance
It’s a dance party (dance party!) Let’s d-d-d-dance!
Turn the music up, sing along, clap your hands
It’s a dance party (dance party!) Let’s d-d-d-dance!

Hop like a kangaroo (hop, hop, hop) 
Let’s dance, dance!

Snap like a crocodile (snap, snap, snap)
Let’s dance, dance!

Run like a cheetah (run, run, run)
Let’s dance, dance!

Step to the left, step to the right
Here we go, here we go, let the rhythm flow
It’s a dance party, everybody make your body dance
It’s a dance party (dance party!) Let’s d-d-d-dance!
It’s a dance party, everybody make your body dance
It’s a dance party (dance party!) Let’s d-d-d-dance!
Put your dance shoes on, wear your dance party pants
It’s a dance party (dance party!) Let’s d-d-d-dance!
Turn the music up, sing along, clap your hands
It’s a dance party (dance party!) Let’s d-d-d-dance!
(DANCE! WOO! YEAH!)

Shake your tail feather (shake, shake, shake)
Let’s dance, dance! Let’s d-d-d-dance!

Jumping on the spot (jump, jump, jump)
Let’s dance, dance! Let’s d-d-d-dance!

Stomping, stomping (stomp, stomp, stomp)
Let’s dance, dance! Let’s d-d-d-dance!

Clap your hands (clap, clap, clap)
Let’s dance, dance! Let’s d-d-d-dance!
It’s a dance party, everybody make your body dance!
